title: Apex Academy is looking for a Silver-Gold Support main!!
body:
Hey everyone as the post implies, we are looking for a Support main for our 5s team. We will be practicing regularly on a flex schedule with hopes to join low level tournaments this summer. All other lanes are taken (So please don't apply for these). We also have a coach that will help the team improve and climb elo. Tryouts will be held this whole week and hopefully a decision will be made as soon as we are done. I'll be giving everyone a fair chance to tryout as long as you meet the following requirements.

Here are the requirements:
-You are at least 18yo (maturity reasons)
-You can take criticism (we have to learn to get better)
-You don't rage (this is important)
-You are between Silver 3 and Gold 1 (No bronzies sorry)
-You can commit to a set schedule (It'll be flexible don't worry)
-You are available evenings (thats when we will be most active)
-You can commit to a team (This isn't super serious but we all want to win and get better)
-You main the role you are applying for (Don't apply for top then when i look you up and see nothing but jungle champs..)

After reading, fill out the app:
And Please don't add me without filling this out, I'll add you :D

IGN:

Bonus points If you tell me your favorite LCS team (NA or EU):

I'll add the ones that meet most of the criteria and we'll interview you followed by a few tryout games. We'll schedule everything so don't worry but make sure to have time for a few games. People who do well get a second tryout :D
